name: Powers
summary:
Always knew you were special? Discover your inner power and become more than merely human.

Will it be fire... or ice? Light... or darkness? Mind Control... or Empathy?

Train your skills and do battle with other players from around the world. Discover your class and band together. Perhaps you'll be a Psychic, or a Shifter?

Earn experience through battles and if you're victorious, take your opponent's inner power by force, and claim it for your own. Learn to master it, and you too can wield it in battle.

You're not different... you're special.
